text: CLOSE French film icon Catherine Deneuve has joined 99 other women to denounce a backlash against men following the Harvey Weinstein scandal. Rollo Ross reports. Video provided by Reuters Newslook French actress Brigitte Bardot says she was never a victim of sexual harassment and appreciated compliments about her looks.
